Math test scores versus anxiety scores before the test

Data used in Exercise 2.96

Anxiety

Format

A data frame with 20 observations on the following two variables.

anxiety
anxiety score before a major math test
math
math test score

References

Kitchens, L. J. (2003) Basic Statistics and Data Analysis. Duxbury

Examples


plot(math ~ anxiety, data = Anxiety)
with(data = Anxiety,
cor(math, anxiety)
)
#> [1] -0.8641968
#> 
linmod <- lm(math ~ anxiety, data = Anxiety)
abline(linmod)
summary(linmod)
#>
